elements.name: Name dem Aufgaben
elements.title: Explain the tasks of the wholesale trade in one sentence each.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Intermediary
elements.correctAnswer: It mediates between manufacturers and retailers and thus closes the retail chain.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Product designer
elements.correctAnswer: Thanks to his experience and feedback from retailers, he passes on suggestions for improving the products to the manufacturers.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Goods distributor
elements.correctAnswer: He organizes transport, interim storage and rough distribution of the goods to the retailers.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: Risk carrier
elements.correctAnswer: It assumes the risk for other wholesalers and retailers in terms of sales, warehousing, transportation, price and quality - it is therefore insured accordingly.

elements.name: question5
elements.title: Market conqueror
elements.correctAnswer: As a representative, he introduces new products and often organizes extensive advertising campaigns.
